basic_node.title: Fragments of radiation across the edges of main beam cross section
basic_node.description: Small fragments of radiation being emitted across the edges of the main beam cross section, as the edges of the main beam cross section are not perfectly sharp cut.
basic_node.references: [sp79, http://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/15/11/28099, See bleeding. No differentiation between fraction of main beam and fraction of light from across main beam cross section illuminating object parts; here.] [sp79, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9495137/, See bleeding. No differentiation between fraction of main beam and fraction of light from across main beam cross section illuminating object parts; here.]
